topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54436ccd6368721e7b7f0200#post_54436ccd6368721e7b7f0200
it has been going on for years

it is over 5000 pages of walls of text, and occasional flash videos, and flash games

all of the text is dialogue
and so much of it is filler
at least
most of it feels like filler
maybe some of it was foreshadowing
but i forgot
there was so much

and so many characters
it starts with 4
then 12 more show up
and then by the end there about 50 characters

it's too much

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54436d0263687276e4e40200#post_54436d0263687276e4e40200
Alien clown juggalo in fake god tier outfit that a cosmic game eventually supplies (which he doesn't actually have as the outfit is fake) is following around another alien called a Cherub around a future ruined earth, ensuring that he will eventually become a super-tyrant later.

The blood is cause Caliborn (the grren guy) shot him. Alot. Clown dude has Joker immunity, so he's okay.


HAVE I MENTIONED THIS THING IS WEIRD!?

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54436dca63687244589b0200#post_54436dca63687244589b0200
i can't even describe what it's about
the main events will just suddenly change
i don't even know what everyone is trying to accomplish
the ultimate villain has two completely different forms
but they both exist at the same time, but in differents places and times
and i don't know how he becomes his more powerful form

it's so confusing
i loved it while i read it
but i fucking hate it

it is a legitimate love/HATE relationship

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54436ebc6368726638c10000#post_54436ebc6368726638c10000
and don't get me started on how death works in homestuck
you have like, you awake self, and dream self
and you can die, but if you get kissed, you can awake in your dream self body
and then if you get killed and die on your, god tier slab, you reawaken in god tier form, and god tier people can only die under very specific cercumstances

and even then, when you die, you still become a ghost
and only the ultimate baddy can kill the ghosts

also the term God Tier
isn't paraphrasing
that's the actual term in the story

when a character accesses their most powerful form, they are god tier
and can only be killed doing something heroic, or if they are doing something evil
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

and then they wake up hungover inside a couple of moons
